item.title: Travel Tips for a great Vacation
item.description: if you haven’t booked your next vacation or are not sure how, refer to my blog, for Travel Booking Tips, for tips to make the most of your money when booking and planning your next vacation. The key to travel is Plan Look for great deals Keep an eye out on last minute deals Use coupons and Ebates wherever possible Ensure everything you book is cancel-able unless you are 100% certain nothing is going to change.
